snippet.title: Rugby 20 | Closed Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order Rugby 20 to join the Closed Beta: http://rugby-thegame.com

The first beta phase begins on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One today and finishes 17 October. Pre-order, play now and share your experience and feedback with the developers on the game's official Facebook page. 

Content available in this beta:
• 20 national teams
• An International Tournament mode
• A Quick Match mode, versus the AI or local PvP
• An Online mode for playing against a friend or an opponent via matchmaking

#Rugby20 will be available on 23 January 2020 on PlayStation®4, Xbox One and PC.

-------------------------------
For more news on Rugby 20, follow us on:

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/RugbyTheGame/
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/RugbyTheGame

-------------------------------
For news about our other games, you can also follow us on:
